name: Glo (itch) (Ghosin)
description:
Glo is a 2 player maze-shooter about using your bullets to light up your path. 

You find yourself stuck in a completely dark maze, unable to see anything. Your objective: to eliminate the other player and claim victory. Use your specially-made Glo-bullets to light up your path and find you enemy. Beware of the shield in the center of the maze, as it will provide an extra life to those who capture it.

Released: June 2018.
